snippet.title: Mind Over Mushroom - Launch Trailer - Turn-Based Tactics Game where movement isn't locked to a grid
snippet.description:
Available now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/791800/Mind_Over_Mushroom
Mind Over Mushroom is a turn-based tactics game where movement isn't locked to a grid.  Command a diverse array of unlockable characters including giant snails, walking bombs, and necromancers. Use clever tactics and a variety of status effects in challenging turn-based, tactical battles.  Embark on a journey through a range of vibrant, stylized, low-poly locations to destroy a grave fungal threat.
